mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS userId, a.head_pic AS headpic, a.nickname FROM g_user AS a WHERE a.id IN ( SELECT ggc.ref_id FROM g_global_correlation ggc WHERE ggc.delete_flag=0 and ggc.ref_type=0 and ggc.user_id=#{userId} ) LIMIT ${start},${limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM g_user AS a WHERE a.id IN ( SELECT ggc.ref_id FROM g_global_correlation ggc WHERE ggc.delete_flag=0 and ggc.ref_type=0 and ggc.user_id=#{userId} )

SELECT a.user_id as userId, a.mobile, a.title, a.content, a.create_time as createTime, gdc1.`desc` as releaseType, gdc2.`desc` as resourceLabel, gdc3.`desc` as resourceArea, gdc4.`desc` as resourceTrade FROM g_resource_info a LEFT JOIN g_dictionary_code gdc1 on gdc1.id=a.release_type LEFT JOIN g_dictionary_code gdc2 on gdc2.id=a.resource_label LEFT JOIN g_dictionary_code gdc3 on gdc3.id=a.resource_area LEFT JOIN g_dictionary_code gdc4 on gdc4.id=a.resource_trade WHERE 1=1 AND a.delete_flag=0 and (a.`status`=1 or a.`status`=3) and a.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
